triples.name: Web search engine
triples.relevance: The conference focuses on research related to web search as one of its primary topics.

triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: Data mining is a core research area emphasized throughout the conference proceedings.

triples.name: Graph neural network
triples.relevance: One of the keynote speakers discusses Graph Neural Network research at AWS AI.

triples.name: Knowledge distillation
triples.relevance: A keynote presentation covers symbolic knowledge distillation and its applications.

triples.name: Commonsense reasoning
triples.relevance: One keynote addresses commonsense morality and symbolic knowledge in multimodal contexts.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The conference covers ethical challenges in AI and AI research broadly.
